subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
College Athletics
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Penn State will not renew the contract of Athletic Director Tim Curley, who has been on leave since being charged last year with perjury in the child sexual abuse case against Jerry Sandusky.
snippet: Penn State will not renew the contract of Athletic Director Tim Curley, who has been on leave since being charged last year with perjury in the child sexual abuse case against Jerry Sandusky.
